title: What is Religion? Bret Weinstein, Tom Holland, Sam Harris, Jim Rutt
description:
It is clear that there are competing understandings of the word "religion", not only today between competing groups but also throughout history. Bret Weinstein mentions his color as "metaphorical truth" to Sam Harris from the Jim Rutt show. Tom Holland in an older video (with poor sounds, sorry) walks through the development of the concept as of Christian history in the Middle ages. While the British failed to share confessional Christianity with its subjects it nevertheless created the concept of "religion" that implicitly framed the concept in a way that transformed the world. This framing deeply impacts the contemporary Christian/atheist conversations in ways we mostly glide over.
